page.title: 12TRANSPORT SALTFORD WEST BATH
page.content: Most households in Saltford haue at least one car ,many two.The older houses do not all haue garages and some cars are parked in the street. Those who do not have cars are mostly elderly, but the bus services are good and pensioners receive Â£5 worth of bus tokens annually.A bus service between Bath and Bristol runs every twenty minutes in each direction, there is an hourly express service between Bristol Bath and Salisbury.Long distance coaches with connections to London and many other places also stop on request in the village.There is now no railway station at Saltford,but the buses run to Bath and Bristol stations for Inter_city trains to London and other places.For travel by air,Lulsgate Airport is only about fifteen miles. Heathrow,coach direct from Bristol. Gatwick by train from Bath.
